other_tests.findings: Regular heart rate of 96 beats per minute, incomplete right bundle-branch block with right atrial enlargement and right axis deviation.
Mild adenopathy, increased interstitial markings, pleural effusions in both lungs.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increase in the mediastinal adenopathy noted on a subsequent CT scan.

other_tests.findings: Moderate left ventricular systolic dysfunction, flattening of the interventricular septum during systole, right ventricular dilatation, moderate-to-severe global hypokinesia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Another echocardiogram showed normal left ventricular function.

other_tests.findings: Pulmonary-artery pressures ranging from 66/32 mm Hg to 82/40 mm Hg (mean, 43.3 to 54 mm Hg), pulmonary-capillary wedge pressure of 12 mm Hg.
Confirmed the presence of pulmonary veno-occlusive disease and areas of pulmonary-capillary hemangiomatosis.
